title: Brazil Confronts a Momentous Bolsonaro vs. Lula Election
description: Brazilians head to the polls on Sunday in an election between two political heavyweights that could have global repercussions.
dc:creator: Jack Nicas
media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:description: Brazil’s far-right president, Jair Bolsonaro, is seeking a second term as he faces off against a leftist opponent and a former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.
